text: midneun jadeul-iyeo! geudaedeul-i bimil daehwaleul gajigoja hal ttaeneun, joewa jeog-uiwa sado-e daehan bulbogjong-eulo gadeughan bimil daehwaleul gajiji malmyeo seongwa gyeong-oesim-eulo gadeughan bimil daehwaleul gajila. geuligo geudaedeul-eun hananim-eul gyeong-oehala, geubunkkelo geudaedeul-eun sojibdoel geos-ila
